entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1006 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of 754,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -120,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 754,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories -19,000,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAndOtherReceivables 283,000,000 + AdjustmentsForDeferredTaxExpense -20,000,000 + AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 394,000,000 + AdjustmentsForIncomeTaxExpense -12,000,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAndOtherPayables -314,000,000 - AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod 3,000,000 + OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss 8,000,000 + OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 0 - ProfitLoss 437,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1006 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities Total Value : 754,000,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/A23RUXWKASG834LTMK28/2021-12-31/ESEF/SE/0/A23RUXWKASG834LTMK28-2021-12-31-en.zip/A23RUXWKASG834LTMK28-2021-12-31-en/reports/A23RUXWKASG834LTMK28-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 23812
